column7: NOTE: for some reason, every copy of this song's lyrics that i can find seems to split up the lines differently. it would be very helpful if i knew which if any was actually official, because it's not clear if some of these verbs are meant to be modifiers to nouns or stand by themselves, and that would slightly help. however, most versions seem to combine はしゃいだ with ハート  as though they're meant to go together. i feel like that results in a dumber translation, though... ugh

seriously, what IS this!? it shouldn't be this hard! i'm sure i'm overthinking it, but i just can't figure it out...
